game.name: OSO
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Welcome to OSO, where you get to add hazards to the map whenever you die! Throw down a fan and launch your friends into the void, or kick them into a well-placed spike to get your revenge.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to OSO, where you get to add hazards to the map whenever you die! Throw down a fan and launch your friends into the void, or kick them into a well-placed spike to get your revenge.
